customer_client.client_customer.description: The ID of the client's customer account.

customer_client.level.description: The access level of the customer client within the account.

customer_client.id.description: The unique identifier of the customer client.

customer_client.manager.description: The ID of the manager associated with the customer client.

customer_client.time_zone.description: The time zone setting for the customer client.

customer_client.status.description: The status of the customer client account.
